msgSnippet: public static void testMyException() { try { methodThatThrowsMyException(); } catch ( MyException ex ) { StringWriter w=new StringWriter();
messageBody:
public static void testMyException()
  {
    try {
       methodThatThrowsMyException();
    } catch ( MyException ex ) {
      StringWriter w=new StringWriter();
      ex.printStackTrace(new PrintWriter(w,true));
      String trace=w.toString();
      ...
        now make sure the trace contains whatever you like..
    }
  }
